entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
